page.title: 12FIXBY JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: We went to Fixby School. We went to the Head and while we were waiting we looked at the pictures and we were very impressed with the details and the painting. Then we saw a bird. It was stuffed and it was called a Black Backed Gull. Then the head came up and we went to a class and we asked some questions about the school. The school was actually started by Mrs Smith and it was built in 1977. In the school they had two computers and they both had disk drives. One was for the Infants and the other was for the Junior school. They had 30 disks. In the school there are 207 pupils. The Head said that they liked projects. The boys liked playing soccer and netball. The girls like playing different games. There was a big field and it was about 7 acres long.
